colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES GANG DU 'GRO BA'I PHYOGS KYI YUL LHA'I GSOL MCHOD LHA NGO MI NGO 'PHROD PA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SPYIR DENG SANG YUL DUS KYI DBANG LAS @004B SO SO'I 'DOD SBYAR GYI BSANG SPYI SGER MTHA' YAS PA ZHIG SNANG BSAD GZOD BRI DGOS PA MI 'DUG KYANG, GCIG TU PHYOGS 'GRO LTA BUR 'DI 'DRA RE DGOS PA BYUNG TSE YI GE MANG PO ZHIG KLAG KYANG LA LA 'BREL MED DANG, PHAL CHER SPYI KHYAB BAM ME PA ZHIG LAS SHIG THOG MDZU GU LTAR GNAD THOG TU KHEL NGES SHIG MI YYONG 'DUG PAS DE 'DRAR PHAN PA SRID SNYAM NAS, ^BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES ZAB RGYAS MANG PO MI BSRES SHING, MING GSAL GYI RIGS NGOR TE SKABS DON 'DRIL BAR BKOD PA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,SVASTI, TSUL 'DI DGE SLONG BSTAN PA'I NYI MAS, ,CHOS SDE BDE CHEN LHUN GRUB GLING MCHOG TU, ,RGYU RKYEN SBYAR TE DPAR DU BZHENGS PA'I DGES, ,'GRO KUN BLA MED BYANG CHEN MYUR THOB SHOG , CES SH'A SA DHA RAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
